hooks.command: CHANGED_RB=$(git diff --name-only --diff-filter=d -- '*.rb') && CHANGED_ERB=$(git diff --name-only --diff-filter=d -- '*.html.erb') && if [ -n "$CHANGED_RB" ]; then bin/rubocop -A $CHANGED_RB; fi && if [ -n "$CHANGED_ERB" ]; then yarn herb:format $CHANGED_ERB && yarn herb:lint:fix $CHANGED_ERB; fi && echo 'âœ… Post-task checks passed!'
